name: Homeless Bean
description:
• Movement - WASD / Numpad 8, 4, 2, 6
  • Interaction - Space / Numpad 5

You are homeless, but today you have decided to change that and make a house with your own beanie hands.

Collect materials and store them in your house to create different houses!

Use the power-ups from the upgraded houses to collect materials or SPECIAL items more easily!

10 different endings to get! (You can also see them in the gallery accessible from the menu)

  • Code and art by Fenisu and Happy Potatomato
  • Made with Godot v3.4.2
  • SFX and music obtained from the Nokia 3310 Jam Resources
  • Godot starter project. Also obtained from the Nokia 3310 Jam Resources
